descriptionHtml:
[size=5]ATTENTION: I'VE MOVED! I'M NOW LADYTYRELL. THIS MOD AND ALL OF MY NEW MODS WILL BE UPLOADED THERE.[/size]

[size=3][u]What I changed:[/u][/size]
(0.5)
-Removed the rock lumps and thistle branches. (Keep in mind, the branches are gone from the area completely and replaced with other flora, so are not available to harvest)
-Added flora such as Dragon's Tongue, Snowberries, Lavender, Juniper Berries and Tundra Cotton. (For aesthetics, I wouldn't harvest the flora unless you want to be left with a bare garden)
-Added a tribute to poor ol' king Torygg, on the platforms outside the courtyard walls. (It's hard to miss)
-Statues: 4 Dibella statues, 2 Sovngarde Watchmen and 1 Akatosh Shrine.
-Static plants such as Aspen Trees, Sword Ferns and Gildergreen Saplings.

[size=3][u](0.7)[/u][/size]
-Map marker fix.
-Moved Gildergreen saplings so they wouldn't clip into the outer palace walls.
(There's most likely small details I left out but you'll figure it out)
~Thank you Aurielius for letting me know about the fast travel marker.~

[size=3][u](1.0)[/u][/size]
-Tables, chairs, food, wine, benches added to around the courtyard.
-Done from scratch to prevent any more bugs, they should be all fixed.

[size=3][u]IN VERSION 1.2:[/u][/size]
I will redo the outer platforms and such to the exterior of the courtyard.

[size=4]UPCOMING PROJECTS:[/size]
*Better-looking Male Marriage Candidates.
*Improved Dragonsreach Courtyard.

[size=4]*INCOMPATIBLE WITH ANYTHING THAT EDITS THE BLUE PALACE EXTERIOR (with the exception of textures.)*Â [/size]

Thank you to everyone who's downloaded and commented so far! It makes me so happy to see people liking what I put my time into, so keep the comments coming!
Also, I encourage anyone who wishes to do a video to do so!

***This is my very first mod (yay me), so I INSIST that you message me with ANY bugs, critique or suggestions.***
**CHECK FORUMS TO POST SUGGESTIONS/CRITIQUE OR MESSAGE ME PRIVATELY :)***
~crashqueenxx
author: crashqueenxx
